(Original) 4 museum houses located in the city center, msheireb downtown that explains a lot of Qatarâ€™s history and culture! amazing trip, itâ€™s the real Qatariâ€™s families houses!! it shows the slavery story in old times and several other stories like oil extraction and technology and many amazing projects. kids will love the place and adults as well. the interior is very modern, the place is clean, there is also a library full of books and magazines related to the museums. there is a very nice gift shop as well ğŸ˜. the place really takes your heart â¤ï¸. the transportation to reach there is various, you can either go with the mini metro or bus or car, which is amazing. you. donâ€™t have to worry about the parkingsğŸ‘ğŸ½. give it a try itâ€™s worth it.

topComments.author: car1ssa _
topComments.comment: (TraduÃ§Ã£o do Google) Eu fui aqui hÃ¡ dois anos e recentemente fui aqui hÃ¡ algumas semanas. Pessoalmente, na minha visita mais recente nÃ£o pude visitar todos os 4 museus, pois nÃ£o tive tempo suficiente. Se vocÃª quiser visitar todos os museus, certifique-se de ter muitas vezes.  Um bom lugar para vir com sua famÃ­lia/filhos. Na minha opiniÃ£o, o museu sobre a histÃ³ria do petrÃ³leo e do gÃ¡s foi o meu favorito. Isso ocorre porque tambÃ©m tem um teatro que vocÃª pode assistir e mais coisas com as quais seu filho pode interagir.  Eu nÃ£o vou vir aqui tÃ£o cedo, mas Ã© um bom lugar!  No geral, recomendo totalmente! ExperiÃªncia interessante!!  (Original) I went here two years ago and recently went here few weeks ago. Personally, on my most recent visit i wasn't abke to visit all of the 4 museums, for I did not have not enough time. If you want to visit all the museums, do make sure you have a lot of times.  A good place to come to with your family/kids. In my opinion, the museum about oil and gas history was my most favorite. This is because it also has a theater you could watch in and more things that your child can interact with.  I won't be coming here anytime soon, but it is a good place!  Overall, I totally recommend! Interesting experience!!

topComments.author: Dee Hammoudeh
topComments.comment: (TraduÃ§Ã£o do Google) Uma Ã³tima maneira de passar parte da tarde. Algumas memorabilia fascinantes e contas em primeira mÃ£o. A visÃ£o geral sobre a escravidÃ£o Ã© bastante reveladora. Os recursos interativos sÃ£o divertidos e informativos. VocÃª tambÃ©m pode pegar o bonde por Msheireb, se quiser.  (Original) A lovely way to spend part of the afternoon. Some fascinating memorabilia and first hand accounts. The overview on slavery is quite eye opening. The interactive features are fun and informative. You can also take the tram through Msheireb if you like.

topComments.author: ë°•íƒœë¯¼
topComments.comment: So nice place and deserves the visit. Jalmood house presents important features of slavery and many documentary videos about slaves trading in this gulf area. There are another 3 houses to document different eras of qatar state. Thanks for the great efforts to make this heritage great village. Special thanks for sheikha Moza for her effort to support this work. All workers there are nice and helpful. Free parking and free access to all the houses.
